content:
I don't know much about this grind tactic, but it seems the refined cc without AC module.
Is this correct? If so, I prepare to modify cc as ac_grind, if possible.
grind is still a work in progress, and will acquire many features beyond what is currently present. Please don't do any downstream work at this point relying on what you see (or don't see) in grind.
Is there a write up or a list of thoughts or anything of this sort explaining what grind is envisioned to be in the end?

Franti코ek Silv치코i 游불 said:

Is there a write up or a list of thoughts or anything of this sort explaining what grind is envisioned to be in the end?

The general vision is a tool that applies techniques from the SMT world to Lean but there is no precise specification so far.
